title: 3dAttribute
description: Prints the value of the attribute 'aname' from the header of the dataset 'dset'.

all.title: Print all attributes flag
all.description: Print all attributes from the dataset

name.title: Include attribute name flag
name.description: Include attribute name in the output

center.title: Center of volume flag
center.description: Print the center of volume in RAI coordinates

ssep.title: String separator
ssep.description: Use string SSEP as a separator between strings for multiple sub-bricks

sprep.title: String blank space replacement
sprep.description: Use string SPREP to replace blank space in string attributes

quote.title: Use quotes flag
quote.description: Use single quote around each string

aname.title: Attribute name
aname.description: Attribute name to be printed from the dataset

dset.title: Dataset
dset.description: Dataset from which the attribute value will be printed
